name: Prima Marinated Chicken Thighs
description: Prima Treats proudly presents an extravaganza of delicious chicken delights that are sure to make your life a Treat. You can choose from a wide range of Sausages, Meat Balls, Marinated Chicken, Crumbed Chicken and Chicken Slices for great taste and convenience. All Prima Treats products come in world class packaging, and are made with high quality Prima Chicken, assuring the highest standards of safety and hygiene. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
